data.prayer: Over 6.34 percent of the people of Dolj are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dolj, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Dolj, Romania.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 39,313 believers in Dolj and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Dolj, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Tatar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Dolj.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Dolj against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who are far from you in Dolj. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Dolj
location.people_groups_list: Azerbaijani, Uzbek, Northern, Jew, Romanian, Chinese, general, Bashkir
